mapper.select: select id, code, cust_code, contract_code, account_code, status, pay_method, pay_type, account_num, pay_money, operate, operator_code, operator_name, create_time, update_time from market.account_money_details_tmp where code = #{code}

select id, code, cust_code, contract_code, account_code, status, pay_method, pay_type, account_num, pay_money, operate, operator_code, operator_name, create_time, update_time from market.account_money_details_tmp limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into market.account_money_details_tmp(code, cust_code, contract_code, account_code, status, pay_method, pay_type, account_num, pay_money, operate, operator_code, operator_name, create_time, update_time) values (#{code}, #{custCode}, #{contractCode}, #{accountCode}, #{status}, #{payMethod}, #{payType}, #{accountNum}, #{payMoney}, #{operate}, #{operatorCode}, #{operatorName}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into market.account_money_details_tmp(code, cust_code, contract_code, account_code, status, pay_method, pay_type, account_num, pay_money, operate, operator_code, operator_name, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.code}, #{entity.custCode}, #{entity.contractCode}, #{entity.accountCode}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.payMethod}, #{entity.payType}, #{entity.accountNum}, #{entity.payMoney}, #{entity.operate}, #{entity.operatorCode}, #{entity.operatorName}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into market.account_money_details_tmp(code, cust_code, contract_code, account_code, status, pay_method, pay_type, account_num, pay_money, operate, operator_code, operator_name, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.code}, #{entity.custCode}, #{entity.contractCode}, #{entity.accountCode}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.payMethod}, #{entity.payType}, #{entity.accountNum}, #{entity.payMoney}, #{entity.operate}, #{entity.operatorCode}, #{entity.operatorName}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update code = values(code) , cust_code = values(cust_code) , contract_code = values(contract_code) , account_code = values(account_code) , status = values(status) , pay_method = values(pay_method) , pay_type = values(pay_type) , account_num = values(account_num) , pay_money = values(pay_money) , operate = values(operate) , operator_code = values(operator_code) , operator_name = values(operator_name) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update market.account_money_details_tmp
code = #{code},
cust_code = #{custCode},
contract_code = #{contractCode},
account_code = #{accountCode},
status = #{status},
pay_method = #{payMethod},
pay_type = #{payType},
account_num = #{accountNum},
pay_money = #{payMoney},
operate = #{operate},
operator_code = #{operatorCode},
operator_name = #{operatorName},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where code = #{code}
